text.okzoomer.config.option.smoothCamera: interfers with Cinematic Mode but it shouldn't be anything negative.
text.okzoomer.config.option.reduceSensit: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
text.okzoomer.config.option.hideHands.to: While enabled, zooming hides your hands.
text.okzoomer.config.option.smoothTransi: Enables smooth transitions when zooming in and out.
text.okzoomer.config.option.zoomToggle.t: Enables the ability to toggle zooming.
The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
text.okzoomer.config.option.zoomScrollin: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
text.okzoomer.config.option.minimumZoomD: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
text.okzoomer.config.option.maximumZoomD: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
text.okzoomer.config.title: Ok Zoomer Config
